title: The New York Times
summary: The New York Times is an American daily newspaper based in New York City with a worldwide readership.[7][8] Founded in 1851, the Times has since won 132 Pulitzer Prizes, the most of any newspaper,[9] and has long been regarded within the industry as a national "newspaper of record".[10] It is ranked 18th in the world by circulation and 3rd in the U.S.[11]
